channel.title: How to change tabs?!?!
channel.description:
Ok, so im using Richscape V4.1 source. When you click on emotes tab, i want to know how you change the text on the small tabs and how to make it tele you sumwer or give you an item. Please post what file i will find this in and a tut on how to, when you click it, it tele's you sumwer or gives you an item.
- X.Me.Out

item.title: How to change tabs?!?!
item.dc:creator: @X.Me.Out X.Me.Out
item.description:
@X.Me.Out wrote:

there is still no ‘yes’, ‘no’ etc… in texthander.java

Im now using Blood-Pkz source.

Its just all the spell names and what they do.

Read full topic

item.title: How to change tabs?!?!
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

you can’t search stuff like “cry” because they jsut deleted all the tab texts so it goes to the defaults like yes no think and all that.

item.title: How to change tabs?!?!
item.dc:creator: @X.Me.Out X.Me.Out
item.description:
@X.Me.Out wrote:

Well, when i go into texthandler.java, its only the text on the teleport spells in the mage book. Nothing to do with the ‘cry’ or anything on the small emote tabs ?!?!

Also, how do i make it tele you sumwer?

Read full topic

item.title: How to change tabs?!?!
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“X.Me.Out, post:1, topic:243450”]Ok, so im using Richscape V4.1 source. When you click on emotes tab, i want to know how you change the text on the small tabs and how to make it tele you sumwer or give you an item.
Please post what file i will find this in and a tut on how to, when you click it, it tele’s you sumwer or gives you an item.

  • X.Me.Out[/quote]

well to change the text on the small tabs goto ur server files and then goto texthandler.java and just search in there

example,

crtl + f search for like home then u cud change the name of that tab maybe that helped :}

Read full topic
